meanings.definition: Furfurals: relating to or derived from furfural
meanings.sent1: The furfurals solution had a strong smell.
meanings.sent2: Her furfurals dress was soft and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The furfurals paint color made the room look cozy.
meanings.sent4: The furfurals clouds in the sky resembled fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The furfurals fabric felt like a warm hug.

meanings.definition: Furfurals: a class of organic compounds containing an aldehyde group and a furan ring
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the furfurals in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Furfurals are commonly used in the production of resins.
meanings.sent3: The furfurals in the beaker started dancing a little jig.
meanings.sent4: The furfurals under the microscope looked like tiny jewels.
meanings.sent5: The smell of furfurals filled the room with a sweet aroma.
